title: View mobile bookmarks on your computer
summary: Firefox lets you sync your mobile bookmarks so you can access them on your desktop.
html:
Your Mozilla account lets you sync pages you've bookmarked on your phone to your computer. Here's how to view your mobile bookmarks on your laptop or desktop computer:

  1. Click the menu button to open the menu panel.
  2. Click Bookmarks. Your mobile bookmarks will appear under Recent Bookmarks in the Bookmarks panel.
text: Your Mozilla account lets you sync pages you've bookmarked on your phone to your computer. Here's how to view your mobile bookmarks on your laptop or desktop computer: Click the menu button to open the menu panel. Click Bookmarks . Your mobile bookmarks will appear under Recent Bookmarks in the Bookmarks panel.
